name: Feed the Turtle King!
description:
This is Rana Naranja submission for Ludum Dare #46 - "Keep it Alive!" Theme.

The Turtle King is starving! Go get him some food. Oh, and there is also an enemy invasion going on, you should be able to handle that, Right?

INSTRUCTIONS!

Protect the king!, his health runs out quickly so he must be well fed, defeat enemies to get food.

Move with WASD

Aim and Shoot by clicking on your Mouse

Press 'SPACE' to perform a Dash and avoid damage.

Touch a Burger to grab it, CLICK to throw it to Feed the King!

Defeat 40 enemies to win!

CREDITS

Programmed by Adrián Salgado

Art and Animation by Antonio Villamandos

Music by Moralo González
